@description.name: @description
@description.body: The mixin controls the binding between model and item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the property, where the value for the tree node/leaf label is stored in the model classes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The path to the property which holds the information that should be shown as an icon.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the label binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the icon binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The name of the property, where the children are stored in the model. Instead of the {@link #labelPath} must the child property a direct property form the model instance.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Delegation object, which can have one or more functions defined by the {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate} interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding the default properties from the model to the target widget. The used default properties depends on the passed item. This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The internally created and used node or
   leaf.
@param.description:
The internally created and used node or
   leaf.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the item (node or leaf).
@param.description: The index of the item (node or leaf).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding a given property from the model to the target widget. This method should only be called in the {@link IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
sourcePath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.
@param.description:
The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetProperty {String} The name of the property in the target widget.
@param.description: The name of the property in the target widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
@param.description: The options to use for the binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The target widget.
@param.description: The target widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the current binding.
@param.description: The index of the current binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper-Method for binding a given property from the target widget to the model. This method should only be called in the {@link qx.ui.tree.core.IVirtualTreeDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetPath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
@param.description: The path to the property in the model.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: sourceProperty {String} The name of the property in the target.
@param.description: The name of the property in the target.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map | null} The options to use for the binding.
@param.description: The options to use for the binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: sourceWidget {qx.ui.core.Widget} The source widget.
@param.description: The source widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the current binding.
@param.description: The index of the current binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove all bindings from all bounded items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets up the binding for the given item and index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The internally created and used item.
@param.description: The internally created and used item.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the item.
@param.description: The index of the item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the binding of the given item.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The item which the binding should be
   removed.
@param.description:
The item which the binding should be
   removed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper method to create the path for binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index of the item.
@param.description: The index of the item.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String|null} The path to the property.
@param.description: The path to the property.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper method to save the binding for the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} widget to save binding.
@param.description: widget to save binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: id {var} the id from the binding.
@param.description: the id from the binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper method which returns all bound id from the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.Widget} widget to get all binding.
@param.description: widget to get all binding.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property labelPath. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property labelPath. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property labelPath. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property iconPath. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property iconPath. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property iconPath. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconPath}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property labelOptions. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property labelOptions. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property labelOptions. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #labelOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property iconOptions. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property iconOptions. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property iconOptions. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #iconOptions}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property childProperty. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childProperty}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property childProperty. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childProperty}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property childProperty. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #childProperty}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property delegate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delegate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property delegate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delegate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property delegate. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #delegate}.
